modName: Tutorial How To Fix The Bug Of A Follower Cant Dismissed
summary: Fixing A Bug, Not A Downloadable Tutorial but Just Read The Description
descriptionHtml:
I have used this myself so do not worry!

problem and this bug occurs in this nexus user http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3980903 - maximusZ09

He considers the problem of Dodge Mod
However, it is wrong!

Simple step :
Console
\"set PlayerFollowerCount to 0\"
problem solved ! - practical and simple 
By metal33br

step by step :
1. We must kill our follower (Optional Take us to the first stuff granting to follower)

2. Open the Command Console (`) (Tilde) Then click on our follower

3. Type \"Resurrect\" Without Quote

4. We Bring Back Follower

5. Then Try to Dismiss Them!

6. If failed, repeat the steps from number 1

7. How It Successfully For me

8. Having Fun!!!

Thanks To:
Allah SWT
author: Aji123 - Me
